articles.description: Lori Harvey put her own spin on the denim-on-denim trend for the W Magazine x Burberry Art Basel Miami party. The model wore a strapless oversized denim jumpsuit with matching pumps.
articles.content: W Magazine and Burberry have united once again at Art Basel in Miami to celebrate art, design and fashion. Tastemakers and influencers from the worlds of art, design, music, sports and fashion attend… [+1970 chars]

articles.title: Ashton Kutcher Does First Sit-Down Interview With Twin Brother in The Checkup Trailer - E! NEWS
articles.description: Ashton Kutcher opened up about his health battle in an emotional joint interview with twin brother, Michael Kutcher, in Paramount+'s  The Checkup Trailer. See what he reveals.
articles.content:
Ashton Kutcher and his brother are reflecting on his recent health scare.
In the upcoming Paramount+ series The Checkup with Dr. David Agus, the That 70s Show alum recounts his Aug. 8 diagnosis with… [+1094 chars]
